sentences.sContent: His favorite book was the Koran, so on occasion he would entertain those who would ask by reciting the Koran word for word.
sentences.sContent_eng: His favorite book was the Koran, so on occasion he would entertain those who would ask by reciting the Koran word for word.
sentences.sCn: 他最喜欢的书是古兰经，所以有时候父亲会以逐字背诵古兰经的方式来娱乐那些挑战他的人。

trans.tranOther: The Koran is the sacred book on which the religion of Islam is based
